chart_description: This chart displays the rate at which the Kubelet requests a token from an alternate token source. The alternate token source is used when the Kubelet does not have a valid token for accessing the API server. This chart helps in monitoring the token requests from the Kubelet and identifying any issues with the authentication process.

dimension_descriptions.failed: The number of token requests from the Kubelet that failed due to authentication issues.
dimension_descriptions.total: The total number of token requests made by the Kubelet to the alternate token source.
